snippet: President Obama told caucusing Democrats that he has kept the promises he made to them four years ago when his win in the Iowa caucus galvanized his run for the White House.
abstract: President Obama told caucusing Democrats that he has kept the promises he made to them four years ago when his win in the Iowa caucus galvanized his run for the White House.
lead_paragraph: President Obama, back in the capital after his holiday break, was making his own speech to Iowa voters on Tuesday night, telling caucusing Democrats that he has kept the promises he made to them four years ago when his win in the Democratic caucus there electrified the country and galvanized his run for the White House.

headline.main: Obama Speaks to Caucusing Democrats in Iowa
